thread.title: Tide advertising 1035124 Apr 16
thread.title_full: Tide advertising Review 1035124 Apr 16 @ Pissed Consumer

title: Tide advertising 1035124 Apr 16
text:
Just saw your ad where a man and woman were at a clothes washer/dryer.The MAN held up the woman's under panties and she had to snatch them away.=== Why is it always the WOMAN who is having various underclothes -- bras, panties, etc.
shown? ==Why is it NEVER the men showing THEIR jock straps, etc. What a TASTELESS, LOW-CLASS ad. ===I will NEVER use tide.
==It is getting really tedious to see ad after ad on various products where the advertisers think it is "cute" to show the women in various situations that are suggestive, etc,. Just saw your ad where a man and woman were at a clothes washer/dryer. The MAN held up the woman's under panties and she had to snatch them away.=== Why is it always the WOMAN who is having various underclothes -- bras, panties, etc. shown?
==Why is it NEVER the men showing THEIR jock straps, etc. What a TASTELESS, LOW-CLASS ad. ===I will NEVER use tide. ==It is getting really tedious to see ad after ad on various products where the advertisers think it is "cute" to show the women in various situations that are suggestive, etc,.
Just saw your ad where a man and woman were at a clothes washer/dryer. The MAN held up the woman's under panties and she had to snatch them away.=== Why is it always the WOMAN who is having various underclothes -- bras, panties, etc. shown? ==Why is it NEVER the men showing THEIR jock straps, etc.
What a TASTELESS, LOW-CLASS ad.
===I will NEVER use tide.==It is getting really tedious to see ad after ad on various products where the advertisers think it is "cute" to show the women in various situations that are suggestive, etc,.
I liked: Tide good for washing machine.
Review #1035124
